posts.post_title: WTB T206 Red Cobb with Carolina Brights Back
posts.post_content: Looking for a clean example. I dont mind if its graded by SGC pr PSA.. please PM me if you have one for for sale.
I think we have discussed a couple of times and have been quite far apart on price.  Pm me if you have changed your mind.
